body_html: As mentioned here, the best idea anyone has is: #1727 (comment), saying to upgrade your NVIDIA drivers. Closing this and locking to make sure the current conclusion is easily found; if there is evidence that upgrading drivers does not solve the problem, we can open up a new bug!
body_text: As mentioned here, the best idea anyone has is: #1727 (comment), saying to upgrade your NVIDIA drivers.  Closing this and locking to make sure the current conclusion is easily found; if there is evidence that upgrading drivers does not solve the problem, we can open up a new bug!
body: As mentioned here, the best idea anyone has is: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1727#issuecomment-285815312, saying to upgrade your NVIDIA drivers.  Closing this and locking to make sure the current conclusion is easily found; if there is evidence that upgrading drivers does not solve the problem, we can open up a new bug!
